name: Local Browser
short_description: Local Browser is a web browser based on webkit  for easily building portable desktop applications using javascript. It is build on QT framework and it give access to the Operating System like executing a program, access to the file system and sqlite. It works on windows and linux.
summary: A portable Web Browser with access to the Operating System.
